titles.title: Physician Ownership and Referral Act of 1993
To amend the Public Health Service Act to limit the referral by a physician to certain services in which the physician has a financial relationship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: 9/9/1993--Introduced. Physician Ownership and Referral Act of 1993 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to prohibit a physician from making a referral to an entity providing a health service if the physician (or an immediate family member) has a financial relationship with the entity. Defines financial relationship. Sets forth exceptions. Provides for sanctions for violators.
